pages.title: The Manufacturing Table
pages.text: The manufacturing table is used to craft different items in $(#34c9fe)HoloContinuum$(). It is basically a crafting table, but with an extra slot. It takes in an extra item (usually a blueprint) to craft various items. $(br2)Check out the next page for how to craft the manufacturing table. $(br2)$(br)$(o)$(#008001)JEI$()$(o) is highly recommended for this part!!

pages.title: The different blueprints
pages.text: There are different blueprints for manufacturing different items. See the next page for their recipes.
